meanings.definition: The office or jurisdiction of an imam.
meanings.sent1: The imamate is the leadership role of an imam in a mosque.
meanings.sent2: During the ceremony, the imamate was passed down to the next generation.
meanings.sent3: The imamate of the mosque was so busy that the imam had to schedule appointments for everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her work gave her the imamate of the project team.
meanings.sent5: The imamate of the mosque was a position of great honor and responsibility.

meanings.definition: The period during which a particular imam holds office.
meanings.sent1: The imamate of the mosque lasted for five years before a new imam was chosen.
meanings.sent2: During his imamate, the mosque saw significant growth and development.
meanings.sent3: The imamate of the imam coincided with a time of peace and prosperity in the community.
meanings.sent4: Her imamate was marked by inclusivity and outreach to the wider community.
meanings.sent5: The imamate of the mosque was a time of unity and progress for all members.
